channel.title: Hi, I'm Denis Shevchenko
channel.description:
Hi all!
I am solo developer from Russia. Since 2006 I was a C++ developer and worked with Linux. In 2012 I switched to a Mac and Objective-C/Cocoa.
My first Mac app is StrictCode, source code formatter exclusively for OS X/iOS developers. Take a look: http://strictcodeapp.com/
I'm glad to be here!

item.title: Hi, I'm Denis Shevchenko
item.dc:creator: lordbeazley
item.description:
Hi, Denis! I’m glad you’re here, too.

Read full topic
